text: Luís Queiró (born 2 July 1953) is a Portuguese politician and Member of the European Parliament for the Social Democratic Party-People's Party coalition; part of the European People's Party-European Democrats group. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Social Democratic Party (Portugal) MEPs Category:MEPs for Portugal 2004–2009 Category:MEPs for Portugal 1999–2004
title: Luís Queiró
